クラス
org.restlet.representation.Representation の使用

Representation を使用しているパッケージ
com.nttdocomo.android.dconnect.localoauth.oauthserver LocalOAuthサーバ処理. 
com.nttdocomo.android.dconnect.localoauth.temp 切り離せないRestletの型を、ここで定義する同名のクラスに置き換えてシンプルに実装する.

org.restlet.data

com.nttdocomo.android.dconnect.localoauth.oauthserver での Representation の使用
 

Representation を返す com.nttdocomo.android.dconnect.localoauth.oauthserver のメソッド
static Representation LoginPageServerResource.getPage()
          成功したらredirectTemporary(uri)でリダイレクト、"login.html".
 

com.nttdocomo.android.dconnect.localoauth.temp での Representation の使用
 

com.nttdocomo.android.dconnect.localoauth.temp での Representation のサブクラス
 class RedirectRepresentation
          RedirectRepresentation(Restletの同名のクラスが複雑で切り離しにくいので、簡略化した別クラスを追加して置き換えた).
 class ResultRepresentation
          ResultRepresentation

Representation を返す org.restlet のメソッド
 Representation Message.getEntity()
          Returns the entity representation.

          Sets the entity representation.

          Constructor.

          Constructor.

Representation を返す org.restlet.data のメソッド
 Representation ReferenceList.getTextRepresentation()
          Returns a representation of the list in the "text/uri-list" format.
 Representation ReferenceList.getWebRepresentation()
          Returns a representation of the list in "text/html" format.
 Representation Form.getWebRepresentation()
          Returns the form as a Web representation (MediaType.APPLICATION_WWW_FORM).
 Representation Form.getWebRepresentation(CharacterSet characterSet)
          Returns the form as a Web representation (MediaType.APPLICATION_WWW_FORM).

          Checks that all incoming requests have a type parameter.

          Handles the Post request.

          Response JSON document with valid token.

org.restlet.representation での Representation の使用
 

org.restlet.representation での Representation のサブクラス
 class CharacterRepresentation
          Representation based on a BIO character stream.
 class EmptyRepresentation
          Empty representation with no content.
 class InputRepresentation
          Transient representation based on a BIO input stream.
 class StreamRepresentation
          Representation based on a BIO stream.
 class StringRepresentation
          Represents an Unicode string that can be converted to any character set supported by Java.
 class WriterRepresentation
          Representation based on a BIO characters writer.
